summary:
Lisbon is the capital and biggest city of Portugal, with about 567,000 people living there. It's in the west of the Iberian Peninsula, by the Atlantic Ocean. Lisbon is one of the oldest cities in Europe, older than most other capital cities. It has been ruled by many different groups over the centuries, including the Romans, Germanic tribes, Moors, and finally, it became the capital of Portugal in 1255.

Today, Lisbon is very important for Portugal and the world. It's a big center for business, culture, and tourism. It has a strong economy, with many big companies and rich people living there. Lisbon is also home to important government buildings and foreign embassies.
title: Lisbon
